items.summary: Remove Abhijit Da's teacher profile image from the Teachers component (frontend/src/components/Teachers.tsx), replacing it with a placeholder avatar or initials-based fallback while preserving all text content including name, classes taught (Class 4 – Class 10), subject (Mathematics), experience (5 Years), and teaching focus

Remove Abhijit Da's teacher profile image from the TeachersNotes component (frontend/src/components/TeachersNotes.tsx) for the 'Class 4 – 10' notes card, replacing it with a placeholder avatar or initials-based fallback while preserving all teacher information and notes features
